Interface VirtualServer

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerHandler, ServerHandlerRMI, SocketServerHandler
public interface VirtualServer

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    chooseBattery(int x, int y)
    Sends a request to the server to select a battery located at the specified coordinates.
    void
    choosePropulsor(List<Coordinates> coordinates, List<Integer> usedBatteries)
    Sends a request to the server to choose a propulsor based on the specified coordinates and the corresponding used batteries.
    void
    chooseTile(int tileIdx)
    Sends a request to the server to select a tile identified by its index.
    void
    chooseTileFromBuffer(int idx)
    Sends a request to select a tile from the buffer, identified by its index.
    void
    closeFaceUpTiles()
    Sends a request to the server to close the currently visible face-up tiles.
    void

    Compares the crew numbers against other enemies.

    Sends a request to the server to signal the end of the building phase at the specified position.

    Sends a request to the server to repair the ship components located at the specified coordinates.

    Sends a request to the server to retrieve the next adventure card.

    Sends a request to the server to handle the player's rewards.

    Handles a list of boxes associated with the provided coordinates.

    Sends a request to join a game with the specified game ID and player color.

    Sends a request to the server to land on the specified planet, along with the associated coordinates and boxes to handle during the landing.

    showFaceUp()
    Sends a request to the server to display the currently available face-up tiles.
    void
    spreadEpidemic()
    Sends a command to the server to trigger the spread of an epidemic within the game's context.
    void
    starDust()
    Sends a request to the server to trigger the "Star Dust" action, causing (some) players to move back in the flightboard
    void
    startTimer()
    Sends a request to start a timer
    void
    stopBuilding()
    Sends a request to the server to stop the building process for all players.

  • Method Details

    • setNickname

      void setNickname(String nickname)
      Send action to set the client's nickname serverside
      Parameters:
      nickname - the desired nickname to set for the virtual server

    • createGame

      void createGame(int gameLevel, int maxPlayers, PlayerColor color)
      Send action to create a game with the specified parameters
      Parameters:
      gameLevel - the level of the game to be created
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players allowed in the game
      color - the color chosen by the player creating the game

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(int gameId, PlayerColor color)
      Sends a request to join a game with the specified game ID and player color.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the unique identifier of the game to join
      color - the color chosen by the player for the game

    • chooseTile

      void chooseTile(int tileIdx)
      Sends a request to the server to select a tile identified by its index.
      Parameters:
      tileIdx - the index of the tile to be chosen

    • chooseTileFromBuffer

      void chooseTileFromBuffer(int idx)
      Sends a request to select a tile from the buffer, identified by its index.
      Parameters:
      idx - the index of the tile to be selected from the buffer

    • closeFaceUpTiles

      void closeFaceUpTiles()
      Sends a request to the server to close the currently visible face-up tiles.

    • drawFaceDown

      void drawFaceDown()
      Sends a request to the server to draw a face-down tile.

    • endBuilding

      void endBuilding(int position)
      Sends a request to the server to signal the end of the building phase at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      position - the position the player wants to move to after finishing the build phase

    • pickPile

      void pickPile(int pileIdx)
      Sends a request to the server to pick a pile identified by its index.
      Parameters:
      pileIdx - the index of the pile to be picked

    • place

      void place(int x, int y)
      Sends a request to the server to place a tile at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate where the tile should be placed
      y - the y-coordinate where the tile should be placed

    • rotate

      void rotate(String type)
      Sends a request to the server to perform a rotation action based on the provided type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of rotation to be performed

    • placeInBuffer

      void placeInBuffer()
      Sends a request to the server to place the currently selected tile in the buffer.

    • returnPile

      void returnPile()
      Sends a request to the server to return the previously picked pile.

    • returnTile

      void returnTile()
      Sends a request to the server to return the currently selected tile.

    • showFaceUp

      void showFaceUp()
      Sends a request to the server to display the currently available face-up tiles.

    • startTimer

      void startTimer()
      Sends a request to start a timer

    • stopBuilding

      void stopBuilding()
      Sends a request to the server to stop the building process for all players. Can only be performed when all timers have expired

    • chooseBattery

      void chooseBattery(int x, int y)
      Sends a request to the server to select a battery located at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the battery to be chosen
      y - the y-coordinate of the battery to be chosen

    • choosePropulsor

      void choosePropulsor(List<Coordinates> coordinates, List<Integer> usedBatteries)
      Sends a request to the server to choose a propulsor based on the specified coordinates and the corresponding used batteries.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - a list of coordinates representing the positions of the available propulsors
      usedBatteries - a list of integers indicating the battery usage for each propulsor

    • compareCrew

      void compareCrew()
      Compares the crew numbers against other enemies.

    • compareFirePower

      void compareFirePower(List<Coordinates> BatteryCoords, List<Coordinates> CannonCoords)
      Compares the firepower.
      Parameters:
      BatteryCoords - a list of coordinates representing the positions of the used batteries
      CannonCoords - a list of coordinates representing the positions of the activated cannons

    • spreadEpidemic

      void spreadEpidemic()
      Sends a command to the server to trigger the spread of an epidemic within the game's context.

    • getNextAdventureCard

      void getNextAdventureCard()
      Sends a request to the server to retrieve the next adventure card.

    • getRewards

      void getRewards(boolean acceptReward)
      Sends a request to the server to handle the player's rewards.
      Parameters:
      acceptReward - a boolean value indicating whether the player accepts or declines the reward

    • handleBoxes

      void handleBoxes(List<Coordinates> coords, List<Map<BoxType,Integer>> boxes)
      Handles a list of boxes associated with the provided coordinates.
      Parameters:
      coords - a list of coordinates indicating the positions to handle
      boxes - a list of mappings where each map associates a box type with its respective count

    • landToPlanet

      void landToPlanet(Integer planetIdx, List<Coordinates> coords, List<Map<BoxType,Integer>> boxes)
      Sends a request to the server to land on the specified planet, along with the associated coordinates and boxes to handle during the landing.
      Parameters:
      planetIdx - the index of the target planet where the landing is to be performed
      coords - a list of coordinates indicating the coordinates where boxes must be placed
      boxes - a list of mappings where each map associates a box type with its respective count, representing the items being handled during the landing

    • removeCrew

      void removeCrew(List<Coordinates> coords, List<Integer> numCrewMembersLost)
      Handles the removal of crew members at specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      coords - a list of coordinates indicating the positions where crew members are removed
      numCrewMembersLost - a list of integers representing the number of crew members lost at each corresponding position

    • rollDice

      void rollDice()
      Sends a request to the server to roll the dices.

    • starDust

      void starDust()
      Sends a request to the server to trigger the "Star Dust" action, causing (some) players to move back in the flightboard

    • retire

      void retire()
      Sends a retirement request by the player

    • fixShip

      void fixShip(List<Coordinates> coords)
      Sends a request to the server to repair the ship components located at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      coords - a list of coordinates indicating the positions on the ship that need repairs

    • loadCrew

      void loadCrew(Coordinates pinkCoords, Coordinates brownCoords)
      Sends a request to the server to load crew members at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      pinkCoords - the coordinates where the pink crew members should be loaded
      brownCoords - the coordinates where the brown crew members should be loaded
